title: Is there any way to counter the frost shadows, twin queens claim?
body:
Just lost a game that was carried 100% by this items active. we were trashing them until the nami finished this and would always engage with this slow and their entire team would collapse on whoever it hits with a 5v1 pick.

Apart from qss or flash is there anyway to counter this in the future?

replies.body: Don't know if it was just luck and their timer running out or if at actually works, but twice now i have run into a brush when the ghosts are heading towards me and the despawn.

It's not a timer, but rather a distance travelled, so if you get far enough away from where it is cast they will despawn. The ghosts have no fog of war and they'll still see you in bushes and will still hit you unless they travel their whole distance and despawn before catching you.

Dont wander off alone and get into a position where you can get collapsed on 5v1. If teammates are wandering off alone ping them to back off. If you're trashing them then a slow isn't going to carry a fight 5v5

This is usually when we are running away 5v5, namely because some fuckwit got caught out and we now have to avoid fighting because it would be 4v5, so they frost queens and catch the two people in the back running away, which with my preference of tanks is usually me.

The ghosts will slow the first champion they find. Therefore your tanks should stand in front of the carries to tank the CC if they see it coming. It's quite a slow projectile so this shouldn't really be that hard. Then Nami will loose the fight if she blows her CC on a tank. If someone gets caught at an important point, you need to engage and force them to focus you.

**Champion Counters**:

{{champion:25}} **Morgana**: Black sheild OP.
{{champion:223}} **Tahm Kench**: Eat any carry who gets hit by the ghost. If you're especially godlike, wait for them to use CC or engage before you W so they waste abilities.
{{champion:201}} **Braum**  and {{champion:64}} **Lee Sin**: You can quickly jump to allies that are about to get hit by the ghost, and tank it for them.
{{champion:157}} **Yasuo**: Windwall OP
{{champion:26}}  **Zilean**: This champion is an abomination ATM, so don't try him, but if he ever gets buffed, his ult is nice for saving carries who get caught out.
{{champion:10}} **Kayle:** Just use the ult whenever a carry gets caught out.

Also anyone with disengage can be good for shutting down the engage in those 5v1 situations, {{champion:40}} Janna, {{champion:432}} Bard, {{champion:267}} Nami, {{champion:79}} Gragas, {{champion:203}} Kindred etc...

**Item Counters**:

{{item:3140}} QSS
{{item:3222}} Mikael's Crucible.
{{item:3009}} Boots of Swiftness
{{item:3111}} Mercury's Treads
Zilean will spank you kid. If you find him bad, you're bad.
{{champion:245}}  I'm part of the new generation of time travelers :D
Pff please, does Ekko have the laugh of a god?
Does Ekko carry the burden for betraying the entire city of Urtistan and all it's citizens?
if someoen stands in the way, both ghosts can be absorbed, and why are you ditching ally to a 5v1 anyway?
Its easy to counter. Just stay in position with your team. the slow shouldnt be enough to let them engage on you.
